DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety effectiveness ImplantLock device contribution 8.0 mm long root-form endosseous implant stability immediately apply continuous functional loading .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Efficacy Using ImplantLock Device - Dental Implant Accessory
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Endpoints - Serious adverse event occurrence rate ( implantation procedure follow implantation ) relate ImplantLock device document Serious Adverse Event Form . - Adverse event occurrence rate ( implantation procedure follow implantation ) relate ImplantLock device document Adverse Event Form . Secondary Endpoints - Determine 8.0 mm long endosseous implant stability use ImplantLock Device . Stability routinely assess . - Determine ability immediately apply continuous functional load 8.0 mm long endosseous implant use ImplantLock Device . The ability immediately apply continuous functional loading routinely assess .
DOC.criteria: Male/Female age 18 . Subject schedule endosseous implantation treatment . Subject able comprehend give inform consent participation study . Signed informed consent form . Subjects suffer disease might disturb bone regeneration heal process e.g . osteoporosis , anemia , etc . Acute infection require intravenous antibiotic time screen . Bleeding disorder . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus HIV positive immunosuppressive disorder . Renal failure ( Serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl ) . Subject allergy metal alloy . Coagulation disorder . Infection / abscess / pain treatment target area . Pregnant nursing woman . Resent history alcohol drug abuse ( within last 2 year ) . Subject smoking . Subject suffer extreme general weakness . Subject object study protocol . Known cognitive psychiatric disorder Concurrent participation clinical study . Physician objection .
